data.title: Rady Children's Urgent Care
data.meta_description: We help people with serious illnesses and injuries at our Children's urgent care locations. Find out more about our urgent care and emergency services.
data.text:
En Español

Overview

We realize that many urgent health care needs can occur after hours, when your child’s primary care provider may not be available. That’s why Rady Children’s Hospital-San Diego offers pediatric urgent care services in your neighborhood for pediatric patients who need medical attention.

Our physicians see patients who require medical attention every day at our Urgent Care centers in Mid-City (San Diego), Chula Vista, Escondido and Oceanside. The Mid-City location offers a Behavioral Health Urgent Care.

Urgent Care Closures:

Please be advised that our La Mesa, and Murrieta urgent care locations are temporarily closed at this time to conserve resources.

Open Urgent Care Facilities:

Four of our urgent cares are open for in-person visits (Mid-City San Diego, Chula Vista, Escondido, and Oceanside). These pediatric urgent care centers now close at 10 p.m.

View Locations

Scheduling

Patients can walk in as needed or schedule the same day in advance using MyChart or the guest scheduling option via the link below:

Schedule
